item.html: <input id="password" type="password" size="10" maxlength="100" value="" onMouseDown="mouse.dispensemove();" name="password" onKeyUp="if(KeyCheck(event, 13)) postData('login.php', 'LOGIN', 'username=' + escape(encodeURI(document.getElementById('username').value)) + '&password=' + escape(encodeURI(document.getElementById('password').value)));">

<input type="button" id="login_button" name="Login" value="Login" onMouseDown="mouse.dispensemove();" onClick=" postData('login.php', 'LOGIN', 'username=' + escape(encodeURI(document.getElementById('username').value)) + '&password=' + escape(encodeURI(document.getElementById('password').value)));">

No username and password? Click here.
Forgot your username or password? Click here.
